title: 5.14 patch FPS unstable
body: Today after 5.14 patch when i started a ARAM game my FPS was like 15-40. When it's usually ~90-140. I even reinstalled whole OS on my PC. But nothing changed. All other games work fine(Witcher 3,WWE2k15, BF4) So i guess it's a patch flaw. Anyone else get same prob here?

replies.body:
better ask to the support 

p.s this isn't the english forum so so you must switch to the correct forum if u want a help in english ^.^
